summary: An Ordinance authorizing the Mayor and City Comptroller to issue Local Improvement Bonds for the improvement of Holgate Street from 1st Avenue South to 9th Avenue South in the City of Seattle, by constructing a watermains under Ordinance No. 13203, creating Local Improvement District No. 1187 prescribing the rate of interest thereon and authorizing their delivery to the contractor constructing the improvement.
